column3: Latest;Siem Reap: A man was detained at 16:30 on 04 May 2020 in Svay Dangkum Village
column6: Siem Reap Province.------After a search by the Internal Security Force of Siem Reap Police at the home of the man
column7: several air-soft guns were confiscated.------The suspect
column9: a 20-year-old male was caught with several guns (at least 3)
column10: ball bearings and gas canisters. The suspect and evidence were sent to court for legal action. ------AREY
